cab.content: fcho Pro pert v?o Govern:y Secret.1376From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary oi State for India,13th May 11)20.(Received 14th.)6091). J 3th May. Malmiss wired 12th May that Agent reported that concen-tration of .1,500 to 2,000 Bolshevik troops, ah Central Asian Mohamedans of various races, at Bahrain Ali during last week of April. Uzbeg, non-commissioned officer of this force, informed Agent that the Bolsheviks intended shortly to bring about a coup in Bokhara, and this concentration was part of scheme for this. Our X. 1242, dated 5th May, to Director of Military intelligence, lends colour to this report.
